import React from 'react'; const Accessibility = () => { return (

Accessibility Features

Detailed accessibility information and facilities for differently-abled travelers at every destination.

Wheelchair Accessibility

Information on wheelchair-friendly routes, ramps, and accessible restrooms at various destinations.

Visual Aids

Availability of braille guides, audio descriptions, and tactile maps for visually impaired travelers.

Hearing Assistance

Details on hearing loops, sign language interpreters, and captioning services at tourist spots.

Service Animals

Guidelines and facilities for travelers with service animals, including pet-friendly accommodations.

Accessible Transportation

Information on accessible public transportation options, including buses, trains, and taxis.

Emergency Services

Contact details and procedures for emergency services tailored for differently-abled travelers.

); }; export default Accessibility;
